body:
Anyone else play the card game Magic: The Gathering? If so, list your decks here! :D

Standard: Temur Tempo (All types of spells are in here, from large creatures to burn to counter. I need Surrak and Savage Knuckleblade, though.)
Modern: Bant Overrun (Using large creatures with trample to finish the game, considering switching to Naya)
Commander/EDH: Bruna's Auras (Commander is Bruna, Light of Alabaster, pretty easy to see how to make the deck)

title: Magic: The Gathering

replies.body: I have a decent amount of cards from a beginner starter deck, but I haven't learned how play :/
